title: Over 60 n172 Old Judges for sale
author: tlwise12

posts.post_title: Over 60 n172 Old Judges for sale
posts.post_content:
Decided to start thinning out my collection and starting to focus on a few certain areas. So, in the hope that I actally keep true to that thought THIS time, I will be listing several n172s (among other things coming soon).

This is a list of all cards I will part with including pose number and price. I have not noted if they are graded (which I should have looking back). 
Several cards in this list are among the rarities listed in the OJ book!
I will gladly provide that information along with images and answer any other questions you may have. 

Thanks!
Travis 
[url]tlwise12@aol.com[/url]
